about_the_game:
A fog of mystery envelops everything you look at. And it's as if you yourself are dissolved in it. Who are you? Where? And why? These questions have yet to be answered.
For here IT is... glittered and then faded. Gone away. But it flooded your body with steel determination.
All the hostility of the dark world begs another question - didn't it ever want you to wake up? All the answers, ahead of you. Where there's only a glimpse of light. That's where IT lead you.

And more

  • Immerse yourself in a dark, mysterious world.
  • Look for the most unexpected solutions to continue your adventure.
  • Unravel the secrets of this world and yourself.
  • Break through every corner of this unholy place.
  • Challenge different unique enemies and situations.


Fall headlong into a dark world where every rustle is a signal of another danger. Will you be able to find anything in it but emptiness and destruction? Find out if you can find yourself, or if you'll remain a cracked Porcelain Mask somewhere in an uncharted ditch.

name: Porcelain Mask Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.2GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.5GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Porcelain Mask - is a platformer where puzzles are intertwined with action. It's set in a huge, evil world that you have to explore. It's a mysterious place and a story to be grasped.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian, Czech, Polish
